description: wheel +‎ horse. Sense 2 (“person who labors heavily for a cause”) is from the fact that a horse nearest to the wheels of a carriage that it is drawing does much of the pulling work.

entries.meaning: (US, dated) One of a team of horses which is nearest to the wheels of a carriage, as opposed to a leader or forward horse.
(US, figuratively) A person who labors heavily for a particular cause, without being concerned about recognition.
(obsolete or historical) A foot-propelled vehicle; a bicycle.
